description: CMake configuration error: The cmake_minimum_required command specifies a version older than 3.5, which is no longer supported. Update the minimum required CMake version.

Build failed due to outdated CMake version specified in cmake_minimum_required command.

Build error due to missing Python package metadata file (DisplayCAL-3.9.14.dist-info), likely an installation or packaging issue.
Test failure due to connection error during socket operations, possibly due to port issues or environment misconfiguration.
